subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r23673 - in branches: SAMBA_3_0/source/lib
	SAMBA_3_0_26/source/lib
body:
On Tue, Jul 03, 2007 at 10:31:15AM +0200, Michael Adam wrote:
> On Mo, Jul 02, 2007 at 08:51:10 +0000, jra@samba.org wrote:
> > Author: jra
> > Date: 2007-07-02 20:51:09 +0000 (Mon, 02 Jul 2007)
> > New Revision: 23673
> > 
> > WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba&rev=23673
> > 
> > Log:
> > Check for integer wrap on incoming data.
> > Jeremy.
> 
> Hi Jeremy,
> 
> I am at a customer's currently and could not react earlier.

No problem, it wasn't a criticism, I just didn't want to
forget it and cause a problem later :-).

Jeremy
